publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-6633 Ross Finnie: Free Personal Care for the Elderly—That the Parliament believes that free personal and nursing care for the elderly has widespread support and continues to deliver real benefits for tens of thousands of Scotland’s most vulnerable older people, allowing them the dignity and independence of growing old in the comfort of their homes; recognises that budget constraints and demographic change present challenges for Scotland’s social care and health services, but, in order to protect the elderly, reaffirms its commitment to free personal and nursing care for the long term so that Scotland’s elderly population can continue to receive the care to which it is entitled.
